bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with e bing 惡病 , malign disease. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 5: 如中風髪直，面如 桃花色，口眼俱閉，喉中作聲，汗出如油及汗出不流，多要下泄或瀉血 者，並是惡候 , “If one has been struck by wind, with one’s hair standing up straight and the face assuming the color of peach blossoms, and both mouth and eyes closed, and sounds coming from the throat, sweat flowing like oil and sweat that appears but fails to flow, and if there is a tendency to discharge with outflow, and to defecate blood, all these are malign signs ”.
